subject: Women and Girls
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Eri Yoshida, the 18-year-old woman from Japan with a sidearm knuckleball, made her debut in American professional baseball over the weekend, the first appearance by a woman since 2000.
snippet: Eri Yoshida, the 18-year-old woman from Japan with a sidearm knuckleball, made her debut in American professional baseball over the weekend, the first appearance by a woman since 2000.
